page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The designated area contains Bittesby the village of Ullesthorpe and part of the village of Claybrooke Parva.Most of the land cover is farmed.The Parish {Church}is in Claybrooke Parva.The A5 London to Holyhead trunk road runs through the area. Ullesthorpe is three miles from the market town of Lutterworth,seven miles from Hinckley,ten miles from Rugby and fifteen miles from Leicester. Local{employment}is limited to {farming}or working in the shops or public houses,and so most people are employed either in the local towns or in London
